verses.verse: When Israel <WH3478> went forth out <WH3318> of Egypt <WH4714>, The house <WH1004> of Jacob <WH3290> from a people <WH5971> of strange language <WH3937>;
Judah <WH3063> became his sanctuary <WH6944>, Israel <WH3478> his dominion <WH4475>.
The sea <WH3220> saw <WH7200> it <WH5127>, and fled; The Jordan <WH3383> was driven <WH5437> back <WH268>.
The mountains <WH2022> skipped <WH7540> like rams <WH352>, The little hills <WH1389> like lambs <WH1121>.
What aileth thee <WH3220>, O thou sea, that thou fleest <WH5127>? Thou Jordan <WH3383>, that thou turnest <WH5437> back <WH268>?
Ye mountains <WH2022>, that ye skip <WH7540> like rams <WH352>; Ye little hills <WH1389>, like lambs <WH1121>?
Tremble <WH2342>, thou earth <WH776>, at the presence <WH6440> of the Lord <WH113>, At the presence <WH6440> of the God <WH433> of Jacob <WH3290>,
Who turned <WH2015> the rock <WH6697> into a pool <WH98> of water <WH4325>, The flint <WH2496> into a fountain <WH4599> of waters <WH4325>.
